name: California King Room
description:
Welcome to the California King Room, a sanctuary of comfort and style designed for the modern traveler. This room is perfect for couples seeking a serene base to explore the vibrant life of Punta Cana. The space is thoughtfully appointed with a plush California King bed, ensuring a restful night's sleep after a day of sun and sand.

Every detail has been considered for your convenience, from the sleek, private bathroom with hot water to the high-speed Wi-Fi and Netflix-equipped Smart TV for your entertainment. Step out onto your private balcony to enjoy the tropical breeze.

name: King Room
description:
The King Room offers a premium experience with a spacious King bed and elegant decor. Perfect for travelers who appreciate extra space and comfort. Enjoy modern amenities including high-speed Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a smart TV.

Relax in your private space after a day of island adventures. The room includes a private bathroom and all essentials for a perfect stay.

name: Queen Garden View
description:
The Queen Garden View room offers a perfect blend of comfort and tranquility. Wake up to the sounds of tropical birds and enjoy your morning coffee while overlooking our lush garden patio. This room features a comfortable queen bed and all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay.

Ideal for solo travelers or couples who appreciate a quieter, more intimate setting. The room includes access to our shared kitchen and common areas.

name: Ground Floor Small Room
description:
A compact and comfortable room located on the ground floor, featuring unique glamping-style decor. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers who still want a clean, comfortable place to rest after exploring Punta Cana's attractions.

The room features a full-size bed, private bathroom, and all essential amenities. You'll have access to our shared kitchen, garden patio, and all common areas.
